fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
eu_initiatives:
Application in due course by may 18th, 2018   for the membership of the Expert Group on Social Economy and Social Enterprises.  
Active member of the European Microfinance Network developing social economy and microfinance initiatives at local level. Studying a common approach with EU organizations such as ADIE. Currently scouting social initiatives with Balcanic country Montenegro to develop Italy - Montenegro social economy activities.
organisation_name: Associazione Centro Studi Finanza & Persona OAdvisory
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Our focus is on helping microfinance and ethical businesses manage and control their risks. That way, management can focus on the core priorities that will move the business forward.
relevant_communication:
Member of the European Microfinance Network. Credited body to the National Microcredit Agency (Ente Nazionale per il Microcredito).  
Organizing a Italy- Montenegro social economy event with the Montenegro  Embassy n Italy in  winter 2018.
